data.message: Yer well holidays might be coming, however we didnt get to see the big red truck tonight in Cardiff all we saw was over 3 hours in traffic only to get within 97 yards of it to be told by a police officer it had been closed due to high demand and chaotic traffic, well thank you very much, and for upsetting not just my twins but every single child who had a wasted journey this evening, disgusted, we have been to see the truck for the last 4 years with the twins, yet this year we miss out all because of the lack of organisation 😡
